1.title: Puppet Master Producer Charles Band

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

1.plot: Filmmaker Danny Draven (Patient Seven) interviews prolific indie horror producer and director Charles Band (Parasite, Metalstorm 3D). Charles Band has produced over 250 films and is the twisted mind behind the horror hits Trancers, Subspecies and the classic Puppet Master series. Draven directed and produced many films for Band. This one-on-one friendly interview is worth the watch.

2.title: Re-Animator Director Stuart Gordon

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

2.plot: Filmmaker Danny Draven (Patient Seven) interviews legendary horror director Stuart Gordon. Stuart Gordon directed the horror classic H.P. Lovecraft's Re-Animator as well as Dolls, Fortress, Castle Freak, The Pit and the Pendulum and many others. Draven and Gordon worked together on the film Stuart Gordon Presents Deathbed. This conversation is worth the watch for insight on this great horror mind.

3.title: Horror Filmmaking 101

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

3.plot: Troma president and madman Lloyd Kaufman (Toxic Avenger) interviews filmmaker Danny Draven (Patient Seven, Reel Evil) about how to produce and direct your own movie.

4.title: Indie Filmmaking Demystified

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

4.plot: You will sit in "horror movie" class and learn some tips and tricks about producing low budget indie films from award-winning filmmaker and best-selling author Danny Draven (The Filmmaker's Book of the Dead, Genre Filmmaking).

5.title: From the Set of Darkwalker

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

5.plot: You'll visit the set of a cult classic slasher film and get to see how it's all done.

6.title: From the Set of Offerings

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

6.plot: You'll visit the set of a 35mm feature film shot in Las Vegas and see the process of making a traditional ghost story.

7.title: Making Urban Horror

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

7.plot: In this episode it's horror in the hood!

8.title: Asian Inspired Horror

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

8.plot: Filmmaker Danny Draven explains how Asian mythology and history inspired his supernatural film.

9.title: Found Footage Horror

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

9.plot: Peek inside the world of the "found footage" horror film as Danny Draven shoot the movie in a real like haunted hospital in East LA.

10.title: Toxic Avenger's Lloyd Kaufman

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

10.plot: Filmmaker Danny Draven (Patient Seven) interviews legendary cult icon and president of Troma Studios Lloyd Kaufman. Troma is responsible for classics like the Toxic Avenger, Tromeo and Juliet and Poultrygeist. This conversation is worth the watch for insight on the inner workings of the Troma Universe.

11.title: Inside the Gore FX

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

11.plot: Have you ever wanted to die in a horror movie? See what it takes to dump a bucket of blood.

12.title: From the Set of Deathbed

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

12.plot: You'll visit the set of a film about a bed that possesses people.

13.title: Sleepwalkers Director Mick Garris

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

13.plot: Filmmaker Danny Draven (Patient Seven) interviews horror director/writer Mick Garris. Mick directed films like Stephen King's Sleepwalkers, Bag of Bones, The Stand and many others in the genre. This conversation is worth the watch for insight on this great horror master.

14.title: Cyberpunk Horror

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

14.plot: Explore the world of indie filmmaking as a group of filmmakers make a "cyberpunk" horror movie on a shoe-string budget.

15.title: Horror Set Tour and Haunted Locations

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

15.plot: Take a tour of a horror movie set, meet some ghouls and explore a real life haunted hospital where some EVPs were captured during filming.

16.title: Horror Movie Bloopers

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

16.plot: See how frustrating it is to get the perfect take and how the filmmakers are always trying to get it right. Something always seems to go wrong or actors flub a line. Scream queen Brinke Stevens also shares a brief story about working on Sorority Babes in the Slimeball Bowl-O-Rama.

17.title: Friday the 13th's John D. LeMay

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

17.plot: Filmmaker Danny Draven (Patient Seven) interviews actor John D. LeMay. LeMay is the cult star of Jason Goes to Hell: The Final Friday and played the iconic cursed antique dealer Ryan Dallion in the horror TV series Friday The 13th: The Series. This interview, until recently, was taken out of the cursed object vault and has been restored for insight into the filmmaking process for actors. A rare must listen interview.

18.title: Inside the Splatter Movie

episode of.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (TV Series 2015–2016)

18.plot: Get out the gag bags and visit the set of a splatter movie.

imdb.plot outline: Open the crypt and peek inside the world of horror moviemaking with horror producer and director Danny Draven (Patient Seven). Featuring interviews with horror legends and plenty of monsters, fx and behind the scenes footage to keep you awake in your crypt.
imdb.title: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror
akas: Danny Draven's Masters of Terror (United States)
plot: Open the crypt and peek inside the world of horror moviemaking with horror producer and director Danny Draven (Patient Seven). Featuring interviews with horror legends and plenty of monsters, fx and behind the scenes footage to keep you awake in your crypt.::HDP
